mapper.select: SELECT A.company_id, b.company_name, b.company_abbreviation, b.province_code, c.region_name AS province_name, b.city_code, IFNULL(d.region_name, CONCAT(c.region_name, 'å¸‚')) AS city_name, b.district_code, e.region_name AS district_name, b.address, b.contacts, b.cellphone, b.business_license, b.brand, b.memo, IFNULL(f.using_technology_count,0) AS using_technology_count FROM shangshufang_customer.student_collection a INNER JOIN shangshufang_customer.company b ON a.company_id = b.company_id INNER JOIN shangshufang_base.china_region c ON b.province_code = c.region_code LEFT JOIN shangshufang_base.china_region d ON b.city_code = d.region_code INNER JOIN shangshufang_base.china_region e ON b.district_code = e.region_code LEFT JOIN ( SELECT company_id, COUNT(1) AS using_technology_count FROM shangshufang_customer.technology_using GROUP BY company_id ) f ON a.company_id = f.company_id WHERE a.student_id = #{studentID,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY a.update_time DESC LIMIT #{startIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER};
